    • Method Detail

      • morseMain

        @RequestMapping(value="/changeToMorse",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String morseMain(@ModelAttribute(value="toMorse")
                                        MorseForm toMorse,
                                        org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        This is the main morse page where the text area and all buttons are displayed. As per Spring specifications the method is mapped to a URI which is called by the front end jsp page
        Parameters:
        toMorse - the to morse
        result - the result
        Returns:
        the string

      • encodeToMorse

        @RequestMapping(value="/toMorse")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView encodeToMorse()
        Once the user clicks the button to encode an alpha String into morse the front end sends the request to this URI for encoding.
        Returns:
        the model and view

      • encodeToAudio

        @RequestMapping(value="/toAudio")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView encodeToAudio(@ModelAttribute(value="toMorse")
                                                                        MorseForm toMorse,
                                                                        org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        This encodes the morse code output into an audio stream. The classes responsible for ebcoding text to audio are found in the MorseWave class. The MorseWave source code will be included in the portfolio.
        Parameters:
        toMorse - the to morse
        result - the result
        Returns:
        the model and view
